Plot: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.
Title: Greenberg
Writer: Jennifer Jason Leigh (story), Noah Baumbach (story), Noah Baumbach (screenplay)
Actors: Greta Gerwig, Koby Rouviere, Sydney Rouviere, Chris Messina
tomatoConsensus: Greenberg's title character is harder to like than most, but Ben Stiller's nuanced performance and a darkly funny script help take the misanthropic edge off.
